ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Horse limits
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm.. So if I wanted to cancel casting I could click horsie away and duck? Or is there too much delay? safefall is cool. I d like to see people jumping off
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm.. So if I wanted to cancel casting I could click horsie away and duck?
Or is there too much delay?
safefall is cool. I'd like to see people jumping off kelethin on horses.
luv,
-Su

> > Can you jump still? or run forward to interrupted a spell?
>
> oh, forgot: no jump, but you get "safefall".
>
> the "run forward to interrupt" is "cumbersome", because
> the mount has to "start" and "stop" moving: there is a
> delay on both actions. that's why it also isn't easy to
> loot things.
>
> another thing about looting: i click my mount about 75
> percent instead the corpse to loot. sometimes i just
> click the horse away, loot and summon it again.
>
>
> - bilt
>
> --
> Biltilie Dwimmerlaik, lvl 57 gnome magician, Tarew Marr
>
